name: Ext_R5_MeasureReport_gr_st_st_measureScore
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MeasureReport.group.stratifier.stratum.measureScore[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MeasureReport.group.stratifier.stratum.measureScore[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MeasureReport|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The measure score for this stratum, calculated as appropriate for the measure type and scoring method, and based on only the members of this stratum.
element.comment: `MeasureReport.group.stratifier.stratum.measureScore[x]` maps to R4B `MeasureReport.group.stratifier.stratum.measureScore`. Type `dateTime` has no mapping Type `CodeableConcept` has no mapping Type `Period` has no mapping Type `Range` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
